Tip of the Day
Crafting outcome will help raise the chances for better quality items seen at the bottom of recipes in the crafting interface.

Fortified wine

From Walkscape Walkthrough

Fortified wine
Type: Consumable
Value: 8
Fine Value: 40
Keywords: Alcohol
Beverage
Search
Keyword: 		Global
Duration: 1000 steps
Properties:
Bankable:     Droppable:
Sellable:     Tradable:

Darkened wine that consists of deep and earthy flavor. It is stronger than regular wine thanks to the additional ingredients and fermenting it has undergone.

The Fortified wine item is a consumable.

Attributes

Quality Attributes

Global -10% Bonus experience
Global +40% Find collectibles

Global -10% Bonus experience
Global +60% Find collectibles

Uses

Recipe Ingredient

Fortified wine is an ingredient in the following recipe:

Item Name Service
Requirement 		Skills Materials
Used 		Recipe
Outputs
Fireball wine Needs Advanced Kitchen service or better. Cooking lvl. 63 10x Fortified wine
5x Crystallized flame		 5x Fireball wine
